TopicTitle: Rewdew animations present: some random animation i though of in like two seconds.

Articles.Content:
So, I saw scott do his "sneak peak at 0.21" and i though, I... I have an idea.

All I have to say is "I regret nothing"
Looks good, the hair turned out well.

I like it, only issue would be the voice acting, i know it may not be your thing but i feel as if thats the only real issue. Other than that great! I cant model in 3D nor animate.. Maybe ill try 2D but my brain can't handle the extra dimension

I like it, only issue would be the voice acting, i know it may not be your thing but i feel as if thats the only real issue. Other than that great! I cant model in 3D nor animate.. Maybe ill try 2D but my brain can't handle the extra dimension

Well, i had some issues with my mic, and the fact that i don't have a super pro sound recording booth. Only an office in a bookstore. I couldn't do the voices in proper emotion and feeling because i have neighbors on both sides.

Also, glad to see people like the new hair.
Ha, ha, ha. This is... Kerbal Space Program!

Ha, ha, ha. This is... Kerbal Space Program!

Yeah, i thought the who "this is sparta" was overused, so i put a twist on it.
